name: The Christmas Rush
description:
The Christmas Rush is a game developed by myself during 48 hours for the Yogscast Game Jam of 2019, of the theme "Giving".

2-4 Players in a competitive arena

Deliver as many presents as you can before the time runs out.

(Not as finished as I would have liked it to be for the Game Jam but im going to continue developing it to a polished state)
